overview: The stylesheet defines a healthcare digital experience design system with CSS resets, design tokens, typography, layout utilities, accessibility helpers, and theme support. It establishes consistent spacing, color, and typography scales for responsive and accessible UI components.
interactions: Focus state for skip links reveals accessibility navigation
Responsive typography scaling via media queries
Dark/light theme switching through data-theme attribute
data_flow: CSS variables cascade from :root to components
accessibility: Skip link visible on focus for keyboard users
.visually-hidden class hides content visually but keeps it accessible to screen readers
High contrast focus outlines using --color-focus and --color-focus-ring
analytics: Potential analytics hook on theme toggle
Track skip-link usage for accessibility engagement
Monitor responsive breakpoint usage for device analytics
test_ideas: Verify skip-link visibility and focus behavior with keyboard navigation
Validate dark theme variable overrides for color contrast compliance
Check responsive typography scaling at defined breakpoints
Ensure container width and padding adjust correctly across viewport sizes
Confirm visually-hidden elements remain accessible to screen readers
Test CSS variable inheritance and fallback behavior
Validate focus outlines meet accessibility contrast ratios
